key_risks: Financial uncertainty and cash flow challenges due to extended collection periods and high debt-to-equity ratio
Regulatory and compliance risks, including potential penalties and legal settlements
Service quality and operational issues, including complaints and lawsuits related to NEMT services
Dependence on government programs, making the company vulnerable to policy changes and funding cuts
controversies: $3.75 million settlement to resolve False Claims Act allegations
Numerous complaints and lawsuits regarding service quality and reliability
social_issues: Low consumer ratings and complaints about service quality
Reliance on government contracts and occasional legal settlements impacting reputation
governance_issues: Integration challenges from rapid acquisitions leading to operational inefficiencies
High debt levels and aggressive debt strategy raising concerns about financial stability
